mapper.select: SELECT a.id , a.goods_id , a.user_id , a.exchange_key_id , a.invest_cash , a.create_time FROM invest_goods a WHERE 1=1 AND a.id = #{param1}
SELECT a.id , a.goods_id , a.user_id , a.exchange_key_id , invest_cash FROM invest_goods a WHERE 1=1 AND a.goods_id = ${goodsId}
SELECT a.id , a.goods_id , a.user_id , a.exchange_key_id , invest_cash FROM invest_goods a WHERE 1=1 AND a.goods_id = ${goodsId} AND a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.id , a.strategy_id , a.version , a.exchange , a.coin_unit , a.base_unit , a.description , a.is_display , a.create_time , a.test_start , a.test_end , a.cash , a.cash_unit , a.name , a.test_result , a.create_time , b.id as invest_id , b.create_time as invest_time FROM goods a JOIN invest_goods b on a.id = b.goods_id WHERE b.user_id = #{param1}
